summary: Space aliens arrive on Earth with their giant shark and intend to take over the planet but they must first destroy Gamera.
cast: Kôji Fujiyama|Daigo Inoue|Reiko Kasahara|Daihachi Kita|Goro Kumon|Shin Minatsu|Akira Natsuki|Kei'ichi Noda|Isamu Saeki|Yasushi Sakagami|Mikiko Tsubouchi|Eiko Yanami|Yoshio Yoshida|Arlene Zoellner|Gloria Zoellner
title: Gamera contra Zigra, la amenaza de los océanos
